title: Retro Tech Watch Faces
summary: Add some fun retro tech illustration watch faces for Android Wear!
description: Retro Tech Watch Faces by VAChoose from four watch faces for Android Wear: "Retro Controller", "Retro Phone", "Retro Camera" and "Retro Typewriter". Add some fun illustrations to your Android Wear watch! All designs created by VA work on circular and square watches.Please note: Faces may take some time to appear on your watch and in your Android Wear app, please be patient! They WILL show up!Add some fun and unique imagery to your Android Wear watch face!
descriptionHTML:
Retro Tech Watch Faces by VA


Choose from four watch faces for Android Wear: "Retro Controller", "Retro Phone", "Retro Camera" and "Retro Typewriter". Add some fun illustrations to your Android Wear watch! All designs created by VA work on circular and square watches.

Please note: Faces may take some time to appear on your watch and in your Android Wear app, please be patient! They WILL show up!

Add some fun and unique imagery to your Android Wear watch face!
comments: Awesome no bugs encountered even looks good on square watch faces
Good but... Could you please make a german version for the typewriter watch face. :)
Worth every penny! Anyone who is anybody owns these watch faces.
recentChanges: - Minor UI tweaks for some watch brands
- Preparing for Wear 2.0 release for stand-alone iPhone users
